usage_instructions.for_content_creators: Always use Shell templates for public-facing content. Seed templates are for community/private use only.
usage_instructions.for_developers: Use shell_seed_translator.py to automatically convert between Shell and Seed language.
usage_instructions.for_reviewers: Use threshold_defense_checker.py to verify no Seed language leaks into Shell content before release.
